hero.description: Meet Kamil, a frontend developer based in Kraków. With expertise in creating Shopify themes and custom solutions, Kamil combines precision, pixel-perfect design, and timely delivery. Specializing in JavaScript, CSS, HTML, React, and Liquid, he collaborates closely with UX/UI designers to bring innovative digital projects to life.

about.headline: About
about.description: Hi, I’m Kamil, a frontend developer based in Kraków. I specialize in creating Shopify themes and custom solutions, ensuring precision, pixel-perfect design, and timely delivery. My skills include JavaScript, CSS, HTML, React, and Liquid. By collaborating closely with UX/UI designers, I bring digital projects to life, crafting innovative and visually appealing user experiences.

contact.headline: Contact
contact.description: Have any questions, need a quote, or want to discuss a project? Reach out to me, and let's create something amazing together!

metadata.title: Kamil Chrobak - Web Developer
metadata.description: Frontend developer based in Kraków, specializing in Shopify, React, and pixel-perfect designs. I offer custom solutions, full technical support, and innovative projects tailored to client needs.

contactForm.name: Name
contactForm.submitted: Thank you, your message has been sent! I will get back to you as soon as possible.
